t=int(raw_input())
while t:
    t-=1
    num=map(int,raw_input().split())
    itr=1
    mn=num[1]
    for i in range(1,10):
        if mn>num[i]:
            itr=i
            mn=num[i]
    if mn>num[0]:
        itr=0
        mn=num[0]
    if itr==0:
        print 10**(mn+1)
    else:
        ar=[str(itr)]*(mn+1)
        print ''.join(ar)
